comment._content: Now this is something I'd like to see in the US.  A warm sausage machine.

comment.author: 51282775@N06
comment._content: Very interesting, Ahrberg was a major player in the market until the 80's in Hannover. But I never heard of this machine. de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fritz_Ahrberg Maybe the picture was taken at central station or the "Markthalle". Old pictures of Markthalle show a similar roof : de.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Datei:Hannover_Marktha... More about Markthalle: de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markthalle_Hannover
